price: O da şöyle der: "Rabbim beni niçin kör olarak haşrettin? Ben, gören birisiydim."
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَنِيٓ أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَدۡ كُنتُ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi lima ḥashartanī aʿmā waqad kuntu baṣīran
